main_definition: Post Meridiem is a Latin term used to indicate the time of day in the afternoon or evening, specifically from noon (12:00 PM) until midnight.

meanings_and_examples.example: The meeting is scheduled to start at 2 pm, so please arrive before then.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used in the business world referring to the latter half of a workday or day
meanings_and_examples.example: We will discuss our sales targets during the afternoon session today.
